Introduction

Dayeon is a South Korean dancer, singer, and rapper under Jellyfish Entertainment.

In 2018, when she was a trainee, she participated in MNET' survival show Produce 48, but sadly got eliminated.

In 2021, Dayeon participated in MNET' survival show Girls Planet 999 where she finished 4th place, securing her spot as a member of the girl group Kep1er.

Dayeon debuted as a member of Kep1er on January 3, 2022, with their first mini-album "First Impact" and the title track "WA DA DA."
